mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.enabled, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.remarks FROM sys_role a
mapper.select: LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = a.id WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.enabled = '1' AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_date

WHERE a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND a.remarks like CONCAT('%', #{remarks}, '%')
ORDER BY a.create_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role ( id, name, enabled, create_date, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{enabled}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )

INSERT INTO sys_role_menu(role_id, menu_id)
SELECT #{id}, #{menu.id} FROM dual
